title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 March 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:23 <polx> has quit  
00:39 <+sburjan`> lol, just found out I met the guy who founded Infinispan at eLiberatica, and atthat time he didn't work for Red Hat  
00:39 <abusenius> has quit  
00:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
01:02 <vmassol> has quit  
01:13 <Enygma`> has quit  
01:24 <rrodriguez> Please, could anybody confirm, thanks in advance, this: I can directly delete rows from xwikirecyclebin and xwikiattrecyclebin tables without any problem.  
01:25 <@sdumitriu> rrodriguez: Yep, it should work  
01:25 <rrodriguez> sdumitriu: thank you so much.  
01:29 <@sdumitriu> Those might be the among the very few tables without any dependencies, along with xwikilock and xwikilink  
01:53 <rrodriguez> sdumitriu: Thanks. I've had a lot of problems with deleted files. It seems to have finished now once I've deleted all rows in both tables.  
02:21 <rrodriguez> has quit  
04:41 <sdumitriu> has quit  
08:20 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <rrodriguez> Please, has this error message recorded in catalina.out any sense for any of you (Running XWiki Enterprise 2.4.30451): 2012-03-10 09:18:50,013 [http://hostname/bin/XApp/XWikiApplicationXwikiserverclass?viewer=information] ERROR store.XWikiHibernateStore       - No data for property author of object id -983978001 ? Thanks!  
09:46 <mflorea> has quit  
10:07 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:39 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
14:26 <tekzilla> has quit  
14:28 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
15:08 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:56 <abusenius> has quit  
16:07 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:23 <jvdrean> has quit  
17:23 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
18:40 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
19:16 <mflorea> has quit  
19:17 <jvdrean> has quit  
22:36 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* rdddea60 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/dddea60634d4363512551206789286f40ed06545 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-test/src/main/java/org/xwiki/test/ui/po/ViewPage.java : [Misc] Add new API for tests so that a test can wait till a page contains a given content specified as a regex - http://git.io/LqyNBQ  
22:42 <polx> has left #xwiki  
22:46 <vmassol> cool, I got the new IRC bot app to work well and with a nice functional test :)  
22:47 <vmassol> now I need to add some javadocs and write the jira and search bot listeners...  
23:27 <vmassol> has quit  
23:39 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki
